episodes.title: The Most Disturbing Cult of All Time (The Ant Hill Kids)
episodes.description: The Ant Hill Kids were a disturbing doomsday cult led by Roch Theriault that lived in the Canadian wilderness. episodes.title: Keith Raniere + NXIVM – Narcissist Genius, Blackmail, Smallville Sex Traffic Cult, and Blue Light Orgasms
episodes.description: "Keith Raniere" was the founder and leader of "NXIVM", a cult disguised as a multi-level marketing self development organization. - Raniere is described as being extremely intelligent, charismatic, and unbelievably persuasive. - NXIVM developed a following by recruiting members through offering personal development seminars and retreats. Several members had “celebrity” statuses, including a former actress from Smallville. - A female-centric inner circle developed withing NXIVM, essentially functioning as a “secret sex slave sorority”. Members were branded with Keith Raniere’s initials. - Multiple sexual abuse allegations, missing persons cases, and other criminal accusations have come out against NXIVM and Keith Raniere. Raniere, and other high profile members has been convicted of various offenses. - What say you?
